name: Space Acid
description:
Modifications:
1. Added a new level which you must complete in 45 seconds or you lose.  A timer is shown and when the 45seconds expire the game ends. Unless you find the goal behind the door.

2. Added a new level where you are chased by lava. The lava rises quickly and you must go up, up, up until you find the goal.

3. Added a speed pickup for the 1st level, skinned the first level [with MSU assets], modified the about page, and wrote the script for the lava rise. 

Thank you,

Calin.
